ygData.subject: Re: Wiz Robe
ygData.msgSnippet: Can t remember FBR stats Robe of the Oracles is Ac 9 + intelligence ??? + mana ??? + wisdom ???
ygData.messageBody:
Can't remember FBR stats

Robe of the Oracles is Ac 9 + intelligence ??? + mana ??? + wisdom ???
